body_html:
Hi @tensorflower-gardener,

@hughperkins has created Coriander that could run NVIDIA® CUDA™ code on OpenCL 1.2 devices. You might want to take a look if that suits your need to connect TF to OpenCL 1.2 devices. Kindly attribute his name and his contribution in case if you plan to use his work.
body_text:
Hi @tensorflower-gardener,
@hughperkins has created Coriander that could run NVIDIA® CUDA™ code on OpenCL 1.2 devices. You might want to take a look if that suits your need to connect TF to OpenCL 1.2 devices. Kindly attribute his name and his contribution in case if you plan to use his work.
body:
Hi @tensorflower-gardener,

@hughperkins has created [Coriander](https://github.com/hughperkins/coriander-dnn) that could run NVIDIA® CUDA™ code on OpenCL 1.2 devices. You might want to take a look if that suits your need to connect TF to OpenCL 1.2 devices. Kindly attribute his name and his contribution in case if you plan to use his work.
